dataList.dlg: I'll protect you with all I can, manager! Oh, um... Don't go too far ahead...
Have you had a good night's sleep? Sorry? Oh, you're wondering why I'm up so early? That's how the Zwei is.
It's lunchtime. I usually have food that's easy to carry around. Must've grown a habit from my training days.
I should stay wide awake at night. You never know when an ambush might happen.
Even if I can't deal a devastating blow... I can take one for you.
Wah, you startled me...! Sorry, I don't like to be approached quietly.
When I first started joint training with Don Quixote, it was rather troubling... But now, I'm quite used to her antics.
In the past... I lost many precious people because I didn't know what to do. The experience taught me desperation. It's what lets me do my best now.
I'd rather be a broken shield than a runaway. ...I don't want to suffer losing anyone else.
Manager...? Please let me know in advance if you're going somewhere... I'm worried sick.
I'll work even harder! I won't let you down.
To be an unyielding shield.
I'll protect you with all my strength!
I'll try my best to keep the others safe!
This way!
Now's our chance!
Ah!
I did it!
I couldn't protect you...
Thank you for having faith in me!
I couldn't keep the harm away...
I think I'm on my way to becoming an actual guardian.
I gave it my all. I'm glad my effort paid off.
I couldn't protect the others. I thought it would be different this time...
